Description: VLS-launched countermeasure that detonates into a number of extremely bright, high-temperature flares which attempt to mimic the hot wake of the ship and draw off heat-seeking missiles. Size: 1 Cruise Speed: 30 m/s Range: 75 m Decoy Capabilities: Signatures: - WAKE Requires Target: No TTGI Autofire: 20 Refire Time: 10 Spectral flares packed into a small cylinder charge, bursts into a cloud of magnesium-teflon flares that used to shine at about a million candela until a canister malfunctioned in a magazine and temporarily blinded Captain Chris Molefe for about a week. Thankfully, space is terrible at venting heat, so these will typically pull any wake-homing munitions off their vectors if you can deploy them in time. Pray the ANO gave your ship a Scryer. - I. Parker, CMC
